name: Ice Rage
description: Ice Rage is a large slaughter level that requires patience to beat it. It includes Doom 3 sound effects for the cyberdemon roar and the plasma rifle. The textures and flats come from sf2012-tex and cc4-tex. Credit goes to Chris Balch ("TimeOfDeath" on Doomworld) or whoever started the Slaughterfest 2012 thread for the textures.Demo of the level can be found at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6WqLEYFiyJM
